title: Mourner boots

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mourner boots are part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, if not killed in one hit, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting.

Advanced data
Item ID6069

Mourner boots are part of the mourner set. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 Mourner on the path to Prifddinas. However, if not killed in one hit, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a stat restore potion before fighting.

[[File:Mourner boots detail.png|left|160px]]
'''Mourner boots''' are part of the [[mourner gear|mourner set]]. To obtain them, players must kill a level 11 [[Mourner]] on the path to [[Prifddinas]]. However, if not killed in one hit, the Mourner will bring all combat stats down to 20, so it is recommended players bring a [[stat restore potion]] before fighting.
